roleset.name: bring about
roleset.note: IMPLEMENT-V NOTES: subject traces seem unusually tricky for this verb. Dunno why. (from implement.01-v)
IMPLEMENTATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry implement.01, OntoNotes sense grouping implementation.01; maps to VN entry establish-55.5-1. Framed by Claire. (from implementation.01-n)

example.name: active
example.text: The results underscore Sears-1' difficulties in *trace*-1 implementing the ``everyday low pricing'' strategy that it adopted in March as part of a broad attempt to revive its retailing business.
example.arg: the ``everyday low pricing'' strategy that it adopted in March as part of a broad attempt to revive its retailing business

example.name: passive
example.text: All arguments against program trading, even those pressed without fact, conclude with three expected results after ``reforms-1'' are implemented *trace*-1: [etc]

example.name: Prepositional arg1
example.text: The agency was created for the implementation of the policy.

example.name: Implementer and implemented
example.text: Anderson has impressed us with her implementation of state-of- the-art information technology.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: His implementation of statistical analysis with the Japanese Candlestick methodology has produced some unique successful trading programs.
